Articles.Content:
As you may know, a new mod that features a lot of cool satellite probe has just been released. Here you can show your amazing communication, mapping or whatever you want satellite.

Let me begin by 3 of mine

MapSat 1, a mapping satellite

SearchSat 1, a satellite making experience in vaccum

And the GPSat serie

This is my PX-120 Space Probe. It's so large because I always overengineer everything, and it supports four Kethane scanners, a full Lazor system, and it normally carries four MapSat dishes, but MapSat makes my game crash when I use it.

And for roleplaying purposes, this is my Sentinel Orbital Telescope, in high Kerbin orbit.
